title: Medal of Honor Recipient Banned from Marine Corps Ball for Criticizing Obama?
subtitle: Medal of Honor recipient Dakota Meyer says he was "disinvited" from attending the U.S. Marine Corps birthday ball in Afghanistan because he criticized the Obama administration.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Obama administration disinvited Medal of Honor recipient Dakota Meyer from the Marine Corps' 241st birthday ball in Kabul, Afghanistan, because he criticized the President.
